title: Learn about Ibn Sirin’s interpretation of dreaming about a pond and falling into a pond in a dream

preview.html: Interpretation of a dream about a swimming pool: Seeing a swimming pool in a dream carries different indications depending on the appearance that appears, the behavior of the viewer in the dream, and details related to the real circumstances that may be completely related to the interpretation. This is what I learned in the article according to the opinions of major dream interpreters. Interpretation of a dream about a swimming pool: Seeing a swimming pool in a dream varies depending on its size and the method of swimming in it, so it is good news about the coming of goodness or a warning to the viewer that something is happening. Due to the increase in family problems and marital disputes, overcoming the difficulty of swimming in it means remaining steadfast in the face of these problems and getting closer to solving them. Accompanying someone to the pool indicates a partnership that brings him closer to one in reality, whether on a personal or practical level, and feeling comfortable and reassured means the success of the relationship. And its expansion is for the better, and its interpretation is that a dream about an unclean pool in a dream is a sign that the dreamer is going through a difficult period of crises and problems. Interpretation of dreams about the pool by Ibn Sirin Ibn Sirin believes that the interpretation of a dream about a pool reflects positive connotations in general, as it expresses the prosperity and decent life that the dreamer lives in reality. Professional swimming with a family member is considered a sign of travel or moving to a new home. But if he sees in a dream that he is swimming with someone whom God has died, this is evidence of his need for charity and supplication, remembering good sayings and behavior, and resisting the mud on his land. Move easily reveals the material loss and crisis that the viewer faces in his life and cannot face. The interpretation of a dream about a narrow pond symbolizes the harshness of circumstances and the struggle against life’s adversities. When you enter the dream interpretation website, you can always learn about the most accurate interpretations of great scholars, you only need to Writing an online dream interpretation site in Google.Interpretation of a dream about a swimming pool for single womenWhen an unmarried woman sees a pool in a dream, this generally means good news and optimism about the coming of goodness in her life, and a swimming pool whose water appears clear and arouses the dreamer’s desire to swim indicates a bright future . In which desires are achieved through striving and perseverance, but playing in it in vain means wasting time paying attention to everything. Directing without specifying the goal he seeks. Interpretation of a dream about a swimming pool full of people for single people expresses success in achieving the ambitions he aspires to in practical life, especially if he swims. Between them with skill and flexibility, and if it is with someone in a position and position, be optimistic about the arrival of promotion and excellence at work, and on the contrary, if the person you are swimming with does not know how to swim, then this is a sign of decline and lack of self-confidence to take advantage of it. Of new opportunities.Interpretation of a dream about swimming in the pool for a single woman. Swimming in the pool for single people skillfully reveals the stability they live in their lives on the personal level with a calm emotional life and a practical level with successive successes, but swimming in the back portends family disputes that will increase with time and

title: Interpretations of Ibn Sirin in interpreting a dream about fainting

preview.html: Faint interpretations in a dream: Fainting is a temporary type of loss of consciousness that occurs due to blood not reaching the brain properly and has many causes, such as: fear, severe pain, excessive nervousness, taking medications or medication, etc., as well as seeing the person himself. That he fainted in a dream makes him wonder about the meaning of the dream and the various clues related to it, whether for a man or a woman, and through this article we will answer everything that comes to your mind in this regard. Interpretation of a dream about fainting The interpretation of a dream about fainting varies depending on the situation that the person is going through, and the following is a detailed explanation. If one sees in a dream that he is unconscious, it means that he will return to God and will not commit any sin again or it will lead him to feel guilty as a result of sin in the previous period of his life. He must repent. Imam Nabulsi believes that fainting in a dream means the dilemmas that the dreamer is suffering from and his feeling of sadness and anguish because of that. A dream about fainting symbolizes illness and physical illness. In the event that someone sees someone he does not know suffering from ecstasy, this is a sign that he is facing Many problems and difficulties. If a woman sees in a dream that she is unconscious and is accompanied by abdominal fatigue, the dream indicates instability with her husband. The specialized online dream interpretation site features a selection of the best dream and vision interpreters in the Arab world. To access it, type Dream Interpretation Site on the Internet on Google. Interpretation of the dream of fainting by Ibn Sirin. The scholar Ibn Sirin believes that the dream of fainting has different interpretations, which we will learn through the following: When a person sees that a person is insensitive, it leads to the frustration and depression that he suffers from. But if he sees If a person dreams that he fainted and then wakes up, then this is good news for him in the coming period. If a person dreams of many people fainting, this indicates that he is in contact with people who are not good and have bad morals and he must break off this relationship immediately. Interpretation of a dream about fainting for a woman Single woman: Fainting in a dream for an unmarried woman has a number of interpretations, such as: A girl who sees in a dream that she has fainted, then this is a sign of the unfortunate events that she will experience in the coming period of her life. Fainting in a girl’s dream symbolizes illness and failure in the progress of things as It is planned for her and it may also mean that she will not get married soon. If an unmarried woman dreams of fainting more than once, this is a sign of joy and pleasure that will enter her heart and improve her mood clearly, in addition to changing the situation for the better. Interpretation of a dream of a married woman fainting Below is a presentation of the different interpretations given by him Jurists in interpreting the dream of a married woman fainting: If a woman dreams of fainting and feels tired and exhausted, this is in reality a sign that she is a strict and stable person and has the ability to control matters and take responsibility. And when a married woman sees in a dream that she is unconscious inside her home, this leads to To the abundance of food, the abundance of money, and the transition to a stage

title: Interpretation of seeing a port in a dream

preview.html: Interpretation of the vision of the port through the site Vision of the roy2a.com website A port is a coastal facility on the shores of the seas or oceans in which ships are unloaded and loaded with goods or passengers. Ports contain cranes, anchorages, and warehouses for ships, and today through this article we will present the most important interpretations that appeared in the vision of the port in A dream from the leading scholars of dream interpretation, such as Ibn Sirin, Al-Nabulsi, Imam Al-Sadiq and Ibn Shaheen. Follow us. Interpretation of seeing a port in a dream. Seeing a port in a dream indicates the experience of prosperity and a life of luxury that the dreamer will enjoy in his life. Seeing a port in a dream is a sign of success and reconciliation soon in the dreamer’s future. Seeing a port It contains many ships. An indication of the coming days and years of the dreamer’s life of prosperity, happiness, and success. Seeing a port in a dream indicates travel or bringing back someone close to travel. See other interpretations: Interpretation of seeing teeth in a dream. Interpretation of seeing a port in a dream by Ibn Sirin. Ibn Sirin says that I saw the port in A dream is one of the good visions that herald goodness, livelihood, and prosperity. Seeing a port in a dream indicates when the traveler returns. Seeing a port in a dream indicates academic excellence, promotion in a job, or success in a commercial project. Seeing a port in a dream indicates achieving the goals and aspirations that the viewer seeks. Interpretation of seeing a port in A dream for a single woman: Seeing a harbor in one dream is a sign of a change in her circumstances and her life for the better, and happiness will come to her soon. For single women, seeing a harbor can be a sign that she has a financial marriage and moves to live in a house with her husband, and her life will be good. Looking at the harbor shows a girl excelling, achieving academic and practical success, and achieving goals. A viewing port for single people. An indication of her connection to a brave young man who has heroic qualities. Seeing a fishing port in a girl’s dream is an indication that he will get what he wants, but he needs to be patient. See other interpretations: Interpretation of seeing sea level rise in a dream. Interpretation of seeing a harbor in a dream for a married woman. Seeing a harbor in A dream for a married woman indicates that she enjoys a calm and stable life at home and with her family and husband. Seeing a port shows a married woman who is waiting for news of her pregnancy in the near future and a huge livelihood. Seeing a commercial port for a married woman indicates her ability to bear the responsibilities of her family and manage her affairs. Seeing a tourist port for a married woman indicates Her love of travel and fun and that her personality tends to be open and happy. Interpretation of seeing a port in a dream for a pregnant woman. Seeing a port in a dream for a pregnant woman indicates that her due date is approaching, she and her child will enjoy good health. Seeing a port full of ships and boats indicates a pregnant woman’s dream of abundant livelihood, good tidings and happiness for her and her family. Seeing a port Empty for the pregnant woman. It indicates the gender of the baby, as it is male, and God is Most High and Most Knowing. Interpretation of seeing a port in a dream for a man. Seeing a port in a man’s dream is an indication of the upcoming travel opportunity. Seeing a port indicates the presence of a single man with an offer.

title: Interpretation of a dream about going out with clothes in a dream

preview.html: Interpretation of dreams about going out with clothes in a dream. A dream is one of the things that a person sees naturally in a dream, but it can express beautiful things that will happen in the future or warn of actions that a person takes. The interpretation depends on the person’s condition and what he does in his life. Many people have searched for the interpretation of a dream about going out with clothes in a dream, and we will learn through our article the interpretation of a dream about going out with home clothes, the interpretation of a dream about walking in the street without a hijab for single people, the interpretation of a dream about walking in the street with home clothes, the interpretation of a dream about wearing clothes that do not cover a married woman Interpretation of a dream about going out in clothes. In the interpretation of a dream about going out in house clothes, this vision indicates a departure from the unknown and the familiar, and contrary to the norm. Therefore, the person did something in the neighborhood that he was not accustomed to and deviates from it. This act is part of customs and traditions, and this vision comes to clarify this practice and the necessity of abandoning it as soon as possible. That he faces on his way to achieving the goals he set. Interpretation of a dream about walking in the street without a veil for a single woman. Interpretation of a dream about walking in the street without a veil for a single woman in front of people indicates that this single woman is hiding a secret in herself and that this secret will be in the near future, so it is necessary to be careful Be careful and let people. Familiarize yourself with the topic, so that nothing out of the ordinary happens. New for her, this indicates the imminence of her marriage, and the interpretation of an unmarried person who sees his hijab in a dream dirty and impure, and this indicates the presence of someone who is working to spoil her reputation. Interpretation of a dream about walking in the street with clothes at home. He said that whoever sees in his dream that he is walking in the street with clothes at home This vision, as we explained previously, indicates that this person is heading in an unusual and familiar direction and that this person must return to the right. The path, in order not to fall into error, and the interpretation of the dream is based on a set of factors that brought the dreamer to its correct meaning. Many interpreters rely on the situation in which the dreamer was in the dream, and the time when this vision occurred. Interpretation of a dream about wearing clothes that do not cover a woman Married woman: Interpretation of a dream about wearing clothes that do not cover a married woman indicates that she is going through a state of adversity, sadness, and worries that she will face in the coming period of her life, and because of this vision, the dreamer will suffer a lot from financial losses, so it is necessary to take into account the degrees of care and attention in all the tasks that she undertakes in It is known that the interpretation of a vision is done by a group of interpreters who have a great position in this science, and at the end of this article we learned about the interpretation of a dream about going out in home clothes, the interpretation of a dream about walking in the street without a hijab for an unmarried woman, the interpretation of a dream about walking in the street in home clothes. Interpretation: A dream about wearing inappropriate clothes for a married woman.

title: Interpretation of a dream about lemon according to Ibn Sirin and Al-Nabulsi

preview.html: I like it FansSubscribersFans Interpretation of a dream about lemons by Ibn Sirin and al-Nabulsi, because lemons in a dream have many connotations that many people ignore. Picking lemons is an indicator of prosperity and good luck. Lemons. They indicate a just and helpful person. Green lemons are proof of blessing and livelihood. Yellow lemons indicate anxiety and sadness. Lemon juice for pregnant women indicates the safety of the fetus and imminent birth. Interpretation of a dream about lemons by Ibn Sirin. Whoever dreams of picking green lemons, this is a sign of livelihood and good luck, as well as evidence of acquiring important things in life such as knowledge. Picking lemons from trees is evidence of people’s love for this dreamer. Whoever dreams that he is picking lemons, this is a sign that he will obtain A lot of money and livelihood. If you see a yellow lemon in a dream, it means illness. Whoever sees himself eating a lemon, he will have a great source of livelihood. A woman who sees a lemon tree in a dream indicates that she is generous and generous. Interpretation of a dream about lemon for Nablus. A lemon tree in a dream indicates that A good and useful person who benefits people with his currency and culture. Seeing lemon branches in a dream indicates a mother. Anyone who sees a lemon tree in a dream, whether small or large, shows the grace and power of the fortuneteller. Lime in a dream is evidence of blessings and livelihood. Lemon in a dream indicates anxiety And the deep sadness that will befall the dreamer. Whoever sees himself drinking lemonade, it will be the boredom into which the dreamer will fall. Whoever sees that he is offering lemonade to someone, it will be a problem and trouble for that person. Lemon juice for a pregnant woman indicates the safety of the fetus and the approaching date of birth. Interpretation of a dream Lemons for a single woman. Only a lemon tree in a dream is a teacher. Seeing her drinking lemon juice shows sadness and tension affecting her. Interpretation of a dream about lemons for a pregnant woman. Seeing a pregnant woman. Lemons in a dream indicate the safety of the fetus and ease of pregnancy. Seeing lemons for a pregnant woman indicates that a male will be born with good offspring. If a pregnant woman sees that she If you eat a lemon, it is evidence of an abundance of nourishment. Interpretation of a dream about lemon for a married woman: If she sees a lemon in a dream, it is a sign of kindness, sustenance, and good luck to come to her. Whoever sees her picking lemons from trees, this is good news for pregnancy. If a married woman sees a yellow lemon in a dream, a quarrel will occur Between her and her husband. Interpretation of buying lemons in a dream Buying lemons in a dream is considered one of the most unforgettable dreams, which indicates the beautiful and happy news that will come soon. Also, the interpretation of seeing lemons in a dream shows a lot of goodness and satisfaction that God gives to the dreamer. This vision also shows The dreamer's transition to a better and more beautiful life full of food and happiness. If the dreamer sees her buying lemons in a dream, this is an indication of a great diet and a large part of it. Interpretation of a dream about a lemon tree in a dream about a married woman: Lemons, for a married woman, this is a sign of many goods that will be her share. Also, Dreaming of a lemon tree indicates a wonderful life that will come to the dreamer and the many benefits that will be beneficial

title: Interpretation of seeing pulling a rope in a dream

preview.html: Interpretation of seeing a tug of war in a dream or dreams by Ibn Sirin, Ibn Kathir, Al-Nabulsi, Ibn Shaheen, or Imam Al-Sadiq through the vision website Roy2a.com. Or it may be a warning or a warning that evil appears, and the interpreters differed in interpreting the vision of tug of war, whether a single woman, married, pregnant, or divorced, with its different meanings. Sirin, Ibn Kathir, Al-Nabulsi, or Imam Al-Sadiq, so follow us. What is the interpretation of seeing Ibn Sirin in a dream? Seeing a tug of war game in a dream is a sign of the dreamer’s strong faith in the power and greatness of God. Dreaming of seeing a stretched fibrous rope is an indication of the physical strength of the pioneer. Seeing a tight rope in a dream and trying Untying it to no avail is a sign of many problems in the dreamer’s life. Dreaming of a tight, tied rope in a dream may indicate the dreamer’s imprisonment. Dreaming of tying a rope and not untying the knot is a symbol of many debts to the pioneer. Seeing a tight rope almost cut is a sign of stress and anxiety. A dream of clinging to a knotted rope in a married woman’s dream is a sign of imminent pregnancy. We see him holding a knotted rope, indicating the accumulation of debts or the imprisonment of insight. What is the interpretation of a single girl’s dream of a rope? A dream rope for a girl Single: A sign of a soon and happy marriage. If an unmarried girl sees a cut rope in her dream, this is evidence of many problems in her life. A dream about cutting the rope for an engaged girl is a symbol of disengagement. Seeing a rope tied to an unmarried girl in a dream is a sign of her soon marriage. A strong clothesline symbolizes strong relationships. Seeing a noose in a dream is clearer. Jurists consider seeing a noose in a dream an unpleasant vision. Dreaming of a noose hanging from it is a sign of some dreamers crying. See also: A written prayer for the stability of the fetus. What is the interpretation of a dream about a tied person? Seeing a single person tied with a rope in a dream is a sign of his imminent marriage. title: Learn about the interpretation of eating almonds in a dream from Ibn Sirin

preview.html: Eating almonds in a dreamAlmonds are one of the beneficial nuts that many people love. Seeing almonds in a dream is a confusing vision. Many are searching for its meaning and interpretation. Therefore, in this article, we will look in detail at the different interpretations of seeing almonds in a dream. Eating almonds in a dream. Also, seeing eating almonds indicates that the dreamer Real metal and he must reconsider his actions and stay away from what displeases God. It is one of the hateful visions for men. Eating almonds in a dream by Ibn Sirin. Ibn Sirin believes that eating bitter almonds indicates that the fortuneteller bears testimony to the truth, and he also sees that whoever eats an almond with its leaves will obtain a new position in his work and will have a high status. Ibn Sirin explained Also, eating almonds indicates that the dreamer takes money from his enemies or from those with whom he has problems. The vision can also indicate the collapse of problems or problems that the dreamer is experiencing. You have a dream and I do not find its interpretation, go to Google and type a site about the secrets of dream interpretation. Eating almonds in a dream for a single womanWhoever sees that she is eating almonds in a dream will receive a lot of good in her life, Especially if it tastes delicious, and if she sees that she is eating almonds, but they open with difficulty, then this dream is an indication of that. Her marriage will be delayed. This dream indicates that this girl will marry a man with good qualities that every girl desires as her husband. Some interpretive scholars believe that a girl who eats roasted almonds indicates that she enjoys a good relationship with many of her friends. Seeing a girl eating nice-tasting almonds in a dream is a sign of good things that will come her way soon. A dream about eating bitter almonds in a girl’s life is a good vision for her because it indicates that her marriage is approaching and that she will get married soon. Eating almonds in a dream for a married womanA married woman who sees that she is eating Almonds in her dream are a good dream for her because it indicates the stability of her marital life, and this dream also shows that this woman will give birth to many children and they will be good offspring for her, and her children will be girls and boys. Eating almonds in a dream for a pregnant woman, and this vision is considered one of the good visions for the pregnant woman, It is good news for her that she will have an easy birth and that her life will be safe and not in danger because of this birth. Some believe that this dream indicates that she will give birth to a child and it may also indicate that she will live happy days in her next life. Eating almonds in a pregnant woman’s dream foretells that she will give birth to a child free of disease and in good health. It also indicates that she will be a happy child and the happiness of her family. Eating almonds in a dream for a divorced woman. Some commentators believe that eating almonds in a divorced woman’s dream is a sign of her ability to overcome the difficulties she faces, which makes her life unstable. If a divorced woman dreams of dry almonds, this dream indicates that she will suffer from some difficulties in finding a source of livelihood for herself. But she is on the right path. The vision is also evidence that this woman is patient and endures difficulties in achieving what she seeks. Eating almonds in a dream

title: Learn about the interpretation of hunting in a dream from Ibn Sirin and Al-Usaimi and the interpretation of a dream about hunting a person.

preview.html: Being chased in a dream is one of the dreams that indicate the difficulties and obstacles that the dreamer faces in his life, and the dream of being chased also shows the desire to achieve goals and ambitions. Chasing a dreamThe interpretation of a dream of being chased is evidence of achieving goals and success, whether at work or in personal life in general, and if the dreamer sees in his dream that Someone is chasing him while he is trying to escape from him, so this is a sign of fear. The future. The dream of escaping from being chased by someone indicates that the dreamer is trying to hide some secrets and facts from others. As for the woman who sees in a dream another woman who she knows is chasing her everywhere, it is one of the visions that indicate the dreamer’s desire not to mix with others and try to Isolating herself from them. Ibn Sirin chased him in a dream. Ibn Sirin explained that the person who sees being chased in a dream is suffering from some pressures and problems in his life, while the dream of escaping from pursuit is evidence of getting rid of the enemies of success. If the dreamer sees in a dream that people are chasing him and was able to escape from them This indicates the success that the dreamer will achieve, and escaping from pursuit indicates a lack of responsibility. A woman who dreams of being chased by someone shows that she cannot bear responsibility, but if she is able to escape from the person who is pursuing her, then she shows the worry that controls her life. Which causes some marital strife. When someone dreams that someone is following him and chasing him and was familiar and known to him, this means that this person is watching your life and following you in reality and wants to know everything big and small in your life. To know Ibn Sirin’s interpretations of other dreams, go to Google and type Dream Interpretation Site on the Internet... You will find everything you are looking for. Dream Chasing by Al-UsaimiThe merchant who was seen chasing in his dream shows the fear that controls him of the losses that he is prevented from being exposed to, but if the dreamer sees Being chased by someone he doesn't know, he feels afraid. The future. When the dreamer sees that he is running away from an unknown person whom he does not know at all, this means that he is running away from problems and getting rid of all the obstacles that he has been suffering from for a long time and the difficulties that he is going through. Via.As for seeing your enemy chasing you in a dream, and you were able to escape and get rid of him, this is evidence of the victory that you will achieve and the elimination of all your enemies soon without incurring losses. Searching for dreams for a single woman. Interpretation of a dream about being chased by one person is evidence of the obstacles and difficulties that stand before the girl. In achieving her goals and dreams. If an unmarried woman sees a man chasing her in a dream, then this is one of the visions that indicate the presence of a man who wants to marry her, but she rejects him. But if a girl sees that she is hiding from being pursued. . , evidence of her irresponsibility. When a girl sees in her dream that some people are chasing her in her home and she is able to escape from them, she will soon have a good husband. Hunting in a dream for a married woman. The dream of being chased in a married woman’s dream is evidence of the many disputes that occur under exposing her or her husband to some punishment.

title: Interpretation of seeing a crying child in a dream

preview.html: Today's topic revolves around a dream about children crying, in the dream and in the interpretation, for the major scholars to see a man, a married woman, a pregnant woman, and a beloved girl. Seeing a child crying in a dream according to Ibn Sirin, and Sheikh Ibn Shirin confirmed this by seeing a male child in a dream, symbolizes the presence of the deceitful and pretending friend of the fortuneteller. And to dream of a team of children crying is A sign of sorrows, problems, and difficulties. As for whoever sees himself in his dream carrying a male child, this indicates that he has reached a prominent position at work. The meaning of seeing a child crying in a dream Al-Osaimi Sheikh Al-Osaimi said that seeing an ugly boy in a dream is a sign of problems and obstacles. Seeing a number of people crying Children are an icon of psychological crises for the dreamer. As for someone who dreams of seeing a beautiful infant, this is a sign of earning money and livelihood. Seeing a sad child in a dream symbolizes the presence of scheming, evil people that will hurt the dreamer. The meaning of seeing a child crying in a dream for a married woman A married woman dreams of seeing a male child in a dream screaming indicates Exposure to problems and crises. If she sees a beautiful male child, this is a symbol of a beautiful, stable, and quiet life with her husband. It also symbolizes the arrival of happy news. If a married woman sees that her son died in a dream, it is a sign of a serious illness. And a dream of hitting a child in a dream and making him cry is a sign of disagreements. Marital marriage that ends in divorce. When she dreams of a sad and crying child, it is a sign that people are gathering around her to hurt her and show the opposite. The meaning of seeing a child crying in a dream for a pregnant woman. When a pregnant woman dreams of seeing a beautiful, smiling child, this indicates the approaching date of birth. It also indicates an easy birth, with permission. God. If you dream of a crying baby, it is a sign of exhaustion during the months of pregnancy. If the crying is loud and strong, it shows pain during the birth period. Interpretation of seeing a baby crying in a dream for a single woman. Seeing a baby in a dream is one sign of kindness and comfort. If she sees herself carrying a small baby, this is a sign of That she will marry a good man and live with him in happiness, prosperity, and prosperity. As for who he was? I have psychological or financial problems and she saw herself playing with children in a dream, so this is a sign of the end of these problems. The meaning of seeing a child crying in a dream for a man When a man dreams of seeing a small child crying, it is a sign that people from Those around them wish him harm. If you dream of an ugly and untidy child, this indicates problems and obstacles that the dreamer faces. Seeing children crying loudly symbolizes a serious illness. Add the dream that you would like to interpret with reference to marital status in a comment below the article and we will respond to it and clarify it.

title: Interpretation of a dream about sending a message in a dream

preview.html: Interpretation of a dream about sending a message in a dream. We will explain to you the consequences of receiving and sending messages in a dream, and whether this is good or bad, as reported by interpretation scholars. Interpretation of a dream about seeing sending a message in a dream If the dreamer believes that he is sending a message to a member of his family in a dream, this indicates his longing for that person. Likewise, if One girl saw that she was sending a message to someone in a dream, this may indicate that she wants to communicate with this person. Sending a message in a dream also means that you will receive good news soon. It can also indicate that the woman is doing well. Interpretation of a dream of longing in a dream according to Ibn Sirin’s message. If The dreamer saw a message of longing in a dream, this indicates his longing for someone. It can also be a sign of good news for someone. Sending a message of longing to someone in a dream can indicate the dreamer’s love for that person. It can be a sign to express longing for that person. Interpretation of a dream about receiving mail A letter from an ex-lover in a dreamIt can indicate receiving letters from an ex-lover in a dream and it can indicate thinking about a loverReceiving letters from an ex-boyfriend can also indicate nostalgia for the pastBecause this may indicate a desire to return to that lover againInterpretation of a dream about a letter from An old lover in a dreamIf the dreamer thinks that he is receiving a letter from an old lover in a dream, this may indicate his thinking about the person. It can also indicate a desire to return to that person. If a girl sees that she is receiving a letter from her old lover in a dream, this indicates her desire to return It may also indicate that the girl may feel lonely and emotionally empty. Interpretation of the dream of receiving a message about a public woman in a dream. If the girl sees that “A” receives a message from her lover in a dream, this indicates her desire to marry him. It could also be an indication of the girl’s engagement and betrothal that is approaching in the future. Soon, God willing. It may also indicate receiving new news about that person soon, God willing. It may also portend many new changes for the girl in the coming period. Interpretation of a dream about a love letter from an unknown person in a dream. If the dreamer believes that he is receiving a love letter from an unknown person in a dream, then he may This means good news. If an unmarried girl sees that in a dream, she will show her skin, God willing. It can predict the girl’s imminent marriage in the near future, God willing. It can also herald new opportunities for the girl. Interpretation of a dream about a letter from an absent lover in a dream. If the dreamer sees a letter from an absent lover in a dream, it may indicate It indicates good news or hearing good news about a person. It can also be referred to an ignorant girl for receiving news about this person, God willing. It may also indicate that the girl is waiting to hear new news about the absence. Therefore, receiving a letter from a lover could be a sign of longing or love. Interpretation of seeing a letter envelope In a dream, if the dreamer sees an envelope in the letter in the dream, then this is an indication of good news for the seeker. Also, seeing an envelope that received a letter can mean
